0.1: Performs up to 4 lightning attacks that deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro>.

1.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> after a short casting time.

2.1: Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> upon impact with the ground.

field.0: #Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.
field.4: On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.
field.7: After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.
field.8: Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
field.10: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

field.0: Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.
field.1: The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.
field.3: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

field.0: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.
Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.
When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

0.0: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
0.1: A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

1.0: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:

2.0: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.

3.0: Lightning Rose now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.

4.0: Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.

5.0: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
5.1: This effect can only occur once every 5s.
